name: find-restriction-enzymes
title: Find Common Restriction Enzymes
description: Identify all common restriction enzyme sites in a DNA sequence
content:
Overview

This application searches for recognition sites of commonly used restriction enzymes in a DNA sequence.

Features

  • Searches hundreds of common enzymes
  • Reports cut positions for each enzyme
  • Works with circular and linear DNA

Parameters

  • DNA Sequence: Sequence to analyze
  • Circular: Specify if circular

Output

Returns a JSON file listing all enzymes that cut the sequence and their cut positions.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && pip install -q biopython biomni && python prod_apps_clone/biomni/molecular_biology/find_restriction_enzymes.py "${sequence}" ${circular} -o "${outputDir}"

spec.name: sequence
spec.label: DNA Sequence
spec.description: DNA sequence to search for restriction sites

spec.name: circular
spec.label: Circular DNA
spec.description: Enter '--circular' if sequence is circular (leave empty for linear)

spec.name: outputDir
spec.label: Output Directory
spec.description: Select or create a stash folder where results will be saved
